participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: caring and ambitious, excited about her future family.
participant_1.background: i just moved into my first home. i'm expecting triplets in three months. i work at a school. i recently moved to this country. i already have stepchildren.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and determined, with aspirations for a healthcare career.
participant_2.background: i make straight as in school. i am currently in high school. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i won homecoming queen this year.

content.text: hello, how are you? i just moved to my first home.
it is great, i just started a new job. i'm excited.
I am living still with my parents because I am in high school...
i am in new york. how about you?
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you have any siblings?
No it is more boring to live with my parents. I would like to live with my friends! I have one sister but we are fighting a lot
But when I am grown up I want to be a physical therapist
i'm sorry. that must be hard.
oh wow! i moved to america recently.
